1.0.name: wordpress/quiz-pro
1.0.description:
Create and add quizzes for your audience through your wordpress blog via a simple interface.

Features Include:

Multiple Choice Questions True/False Questions Scoring

Use the shortcode [QuizPro quiz="***"] to add the quiz number *** to your post.
